name: Rando'min, the Knight
description:
Rando'min the Knight

is a 1 vs 1 turn-based game in which chance is the greatest exponent, friend and foe at the same time. 

Today, in this game, chance has a name: RANDOMIGHT!

Try to defeat your enemy with the preset points, distributing them with your own strategy and compete with your friends to see who defeats the bad guy first.

Who will have luck on their side today?


THIS GAME WAS CREATED IN 8 HOURS FOR THE LEVEL UP GAME JAM BY A SINGLE PERSON. Whats next? 

-Adding RogueLike elements like:

• Level Ups to choose like potions, more points to distribute... 

• New skills to unlock like Magic attack & defense. 

• A lot of new enemies and heroes

- And new aesthetics! (For this prototype the Asset Store was my bestie so... ) 

How to play

The controls are  simple:

Through the mouse, distribute the points you possess through the arrows you will see at the bottom left of the screen.

Check if this distribution is the best against your opponent's attributes and press RANDOMIGHT!

Who will be the winner, who will run out of luck first?
